TEXT.TITLE: GOLDEN POULTRY <CHIK> TO MAKE ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: golden Poultry Co Inc said it has signed a letter of intent to purchase privately-held food distributor Don Lowe Foods Inc of Pompano Beach, Fla., for undisclosed terms, subject to approval by both boards. It said Tampa operations of Lowe are not involved in the sale. Reuter
